newsitem.title: MOROCCO: Sale of 6.07 pct of Morocco's oversubscribed.
newsitem.headline: Sale of 6.07 pct of Morocco's oversubscribed.

text.p: The flotation of half of U.S. businessman George Soros's portfolio in the Moroccan firm Financiere Diwan was 1.8 times oversubscribed, Casablanca Finance Intermediation (CFI) brokerage said.

Soros owned 12.7 percent of the company and sold off 6.07 percent of this. "Sale of 50 percent of Soros's stake in Financiere Diwan was a real success," a CFI spokesman told a news conference late on Tuesday.
With 500,000 shares on offer worth 165 million dirhams ($17.4 million), at 330 dirhams per share, total demand was for 892,968 shares.
Up to 4,109 subscribers bought 300,000 shares which were available for the general public while 33 institutional investors including eight foreigners acquired the remaining 200,000 shares.
The firm last traded at 350 dirhams on Tuesday.
